title: Kiss: Man, Person, Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple Kiss: Man, Person, Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a kiss between a man and a person with light skin tone, conveying affection, love, and romance. It signifies intimacy and a close relationship.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss man emoji presents a stylized figure with a light skin tone, leaning in with eyes closed, conveying a tender and affectionate gesture. The smooth, rounded edges and realistic lighting on Apple devices give the emoji a soft, gentle appearance, accentuated by subtle glossy highlights. This emoji, with its warm visual tone, is commonly used to express love, affection, or a sweet goodbye in digital communication on Apple devices.
